chapter.title: Combining Modifiers
chapter.para: You can apply any number of modifiers to a variable. They will be applied in the order they are combined, from left to right. They must be separated with a | (pipe) character.

$smarty->assign('articleTitle', 'Smokers are Productive, but Death Cuts Efficiency.');
